name: Many Many Rooms
description:
Long time ago, you got banned and the Temple is your prison. Connect rooms to escape. 

WASD/Arrowkeys to move

E to interact

R to restart

Esc to end the game

This game was created for the Lost Relic Games - Game JAM. The Theme is "connection" hope you enjoy

I used Unreal Engine, Blender, Substance Painter/Designer

The Music was created by Joel Loopez

The Sound Effects are from GameBurp Sound Effects
